GameMessage.ScatterWin: %1 SCATTER SYMBOLS WIN %2 CREDITS AND %3 FREE SPINS!!
GameMessage.FreeGameTrigger: %1 SCATTER SYMBOLS WIN %2 CREDITS AND %3 FREE SPINS!!
GameMessage.BonusGameTrigger: UFO Sign on Reels 1 and 5 Trigger Alien Picking Bonus!!
GameMessage.FreeGameReTriggerZero: %1 SCATTER SYMBOLS WIN %2 MORE FREE SPINS!!
GameMessage.FreeGameReTrigger: %1 SCATTER SYMBOLS WIN %2 CREDITS AND %3 MORE FREE SPINS!!
GameMessage.BonusInstructionText1: PICK ONE OF THE ALIENS TO REVEAL A CREDIT AMOUNT

PromoMessage.BaseGamePromo1: 2 or more consecutive Scatter Symbols starting from the leftmost reel will start the FREE GAME FEATURE!
PromoMessage.FreeGamePromo1: ALL WINS DOUBLE DURING FREE SPINS

HelpScreen.Free_Game_Rules_Text2: 2 or more consecutive Scatter Symbols starting from the leftmost reel will start the FREE GAME FEATURE!
HelpScreen.Free_Game_Rules_Text3: Additional Free Games can be won during Free Game Feature!
HelpScreen.Free_Game_Rules_Text12: Jackpot cannot be won during Free Games Feature play
HelpScreen.Free_Game_Rules_Text13: Malfunction voids all pays and plays • Number of lines played and credits bet per line are the same as the game that triggered the Free Spins
HelpScreen.Paylines_1: Bet up to 10 credits per line. Bet level can be adjusted on the SETTINGS window of the main menu.
HelpScreen.Paylines_2: All lines pay left to right, starting with the left most reels, including scatters • All wins showing with credit per line at 1 • All amounts are displayed in credits • Malfunction voids all pays and plays • Multiply line wins by the number of credits bet per lines
HelpScreen.Payout_1_10: In any combination left to right only
HelpScreen.Payout_1_15: All lines pay left to right, starting with the left most reels, including scatters • All wins showing with credit per line at 1 • Win up to two ways on every payline: Highest wild-only line win paid in addition to highest wild-substituting line win • All amounts are displayed in credits • Malfunction voids all pays and plays • Multiply line wins by the number of credits bet per lines
HelpScreen.Payout_2_1: All lines pay left to right, starting with the left most reels, including scatters • All wins showing with credit per line at 1 • All amounts are displayed in credits • Malfunction voids all pays and plays • Multiply line wins by the number of credits bet per lines
HelpScreen.Payout_3_2: 3 or more consecutive Scatter Symbols appearing from the leftmost reel will award Scatter Pay.
HelpScreen.Payout_3_3: All lines pay left to right, starting with the left most reels, including scatters • Multiply wins by the number of credits bet on payline • Scatter wins are paid in addition to line wins • Scatter wins are multiplied by total credits bet • Malfunction voids all pays and plays • All amounts are displayed in credits
